content.rendered:
2009 – Security BSides Framework Launched in United States
2012 – Over 30 events held in US, Europe, Africa, South America, Australia
2013 – Security B-Sides Orlando is launched with 200 attendees
2014 – Security B-Sides Orlando gains in its second year with 300 attendees
2015 – Security B-Sides Orlando changes venue to major research university, UCF
2016 – Security B-Sides Orlando grows it’s second year at UCF
2017 – Security B-Sides Orlando moves to larger venue at Valencia College
2018 – Security B-Sides Orlando grows to media college, Full Sail
